full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA'I SPYOD PA LA 'JUG PA ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @083B BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA'I SPYOD PA LA 'JUG PA SLOB DPON SH'AN TA DE BAS MDZAD PA RDZOGS SO,, ,,RGYA GAR GYI MKHAN PO SARBA DZNY'A DE BA DANG, ZHU CHEN GYI LOTZ'A BA BANDE DPAL BRTZEGS KYIS KHA CHE'I DPE LAS BSGYUR CING ZHUS TE GTAN LA PHAB PA LAS, SLAD KYI RGYA GAR GYI MKHAN PO DHARMA SHR'I BHADRA DANG, ZHU CHEN GYI LOTZ'A BA BANDE RIN CHEN BZANG PO DANG, SH'AKYA BLO GROS KYIS YUL DBUS KYI DPE DANG 'BREL PA DANG MTHUN PAR BCOS SHING BSGYUR TE GTAN LA PHAB PA'O,, ,,YANG DUS SPHYIS RGYA GAR GYI @084A *, ,MKHAN PO SU MA TI K'IRTI DANG, ZHU CHEN GYI LO TZ'A BA DGE SLONG BLO LDAN SHES RAB KYIS DAG PAR BCOS SHING BSGYUR TE LEGS PAR GTAN LA PHAB PA'O,, ,,AOm SVASTI, BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA'I SDE SNOD GNAD, ,BYANG CHUB SPYOD PA'I LAM GCIG TU, ,BYANG CHUB SEMS DPAS BSDUS PA'I GZHUNG, ,BYANG CHUB MING GIS SPAR DU SGRUBS,, ,,SARBA D'A MANGGA LAm BHA BA TU,, ,,
translator_(орчуулагч): SARBA DZNY'A DE BA, DPAL BRTZEGS, DHARMA SHR'I BHADRA, RIN CHEN BZANG PO, SH'AKYA BLO GROS, SU MA TI K'IRTI, BLO LDAN SHES RAB,
